summary: Visual improvements testing completed - All 12 features tested successfully. Arcade Core +30% larger, Mario silhouette (12% opacity), star sparkles, AI PREDICTION compact card aligned with providers, CTA with blue neon border + red button, all responsive layouts working.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All visual improvements verified. Key features: (1) Arcade Core +30% larger with projected glow (radial-gradient violet/blue on background); (2) Mario silhouette SVG outline with neon gradient (12% opacity) behind Core; (3) 12 star sparkles floating in background; (4) 3 orbiting icons: coin (amber-400), star (violet-400), mushroom (emerald-400); (5) AI PREDICTION compact premium card aligned with 5 providers; (6) Providers: 5-col grid desktop, 3-col tablet, horizontal carousel mobile; (7) 200+ games with animated bar and MOCKED AI accuracy; (8) CTA with animated blue neon border + RED 'COMEÇAR AGORA' button; (9) Thumbnail with blue glow border; (10) Light reflection from Core on cards below; (11) Decorative line with blue/violet + red accents (Mario ref)
mocked_api_note: AI Accuracy percentage (90-99.5%) is MOCKED - animated locally via JavaScript setInterval
